article_title: Ephrata cattle dealer has high hopes for beef abroad
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: PHILIP GRUBER

og.description: While many people have been looking for ways to meet the demand for beef cattle in the United States, Howard Scarff still sees the appeal of U.S. cattle abroad.
